author: Team edplore
title: Hello World!
content:
Today, on the most auspicious of all the days, we announce our arrival. 
 The game 'edplore' was conceptualized more than three years back. Two whole years of deep delve into students' challenges and expectations along with one and half years of rigorous development with countless feedback cycles are behind how this game could finally see the light of day today. 

 Dearest Students, Thanks for everything. This is for you. Happy exploring!
